recordCreates.description: Create the record and set the default threshold to 10
recordCreates.name: Create_Chat_User_License_Tracker
recordCreates.label: Create Chat User License Tracker

recordLookups.description: SELECT Featuretype, Activeusercount, AssignedUserCount, TotalLicenseCount FROM ActiveFeatureLicenseMetric WHERE Featuretype = 'LiveAgentUser' Order By Metricsdate DESC
recordLookups.name: Get_Chat_User_Licenses
recordLookups.label: Get Chat User Licenses

recordLookups.description: Get the data on the managed package
recordLookups.name: Get_CXOne_Managed_Package_Data
recordLookups.label: Get CXOne Managed Package Data

recordLookups.description: Get data from the last package license assignment so it can be used to report on the last time the package was assigned to a user. This is because the Packagelicense object does not track the last time a license was assigned or unassigned. So, this is better than nothing! :-)
recordLookups.name: Get_data_from_the_last_CXOne_Managed_Package_Assignement
recordLookups.label: Get data from the last CXOne Managed Package Assignement

recordLookups.description:
Get the number of licenses
SELECT developername, ID, Totallicenses, MasterLabel, UsedLicenses from Permissionsetlicense Where developername = 'SalesConsoleUser'
recordLookups.name: Get_Sales_Console_Licenses
recordLookups.label: Get Sales Console Licenses

recordLookups.description:
Get all the licenses records for the flow
SELECT TotalLicenses, UsedLicensesLastUpdated, Name, UsedLicenses From Userlicense WHERE Name = 'Salesforce'
recordLookups.name: Get_Salesforce_User_Licenses
recordLookups.label: Get Salesforce User Licenses

recordLookups.description: SELECT Featuretype, Activeusercount, AssignedUserCount, TotalLicenseCount FROM ActiveFeatureLicenseMetric WHERE Featuretype = 'SupportUser' Order By Metricsdate DESC
recordLookups.name: Get_Service_Cloud_Licenses
recordLookups.label: Get Service Cloud Licenses

variables.name: var_Chat_User_Tracking_Record

variables.name: var_CXOne_Managed_Package_Tracker

variables.name: var_Last_CXOne_License_Assignment_Data

variables.name: var_Salesforce_Tracking_Record

variables.description: All the details for the service cloud license
variables.name: var_Service_Cloud_Data

variables.name: var_Service_Cloud_Tracking_Record

variables.name: var_SF_TrackingRecords_To_Update
